VITALITY SYSTEM - UPGRADES DIAGNOSTIC REPORT
================================================================================

This report shows detailed combat mechanics for individual upgrades across all scenarios.
Tests 1×100, 2×50, 4×25, and 10×10 HP enemy configurations for each upgrade.
